scn fbmwbmHircineRingScript

Begin OnEquip
	set fbmwBMHircinesRingControlQuest.time to GameHour
	set fbmwBMHircinesRingControlQuest.Actor to GetContainer
	set fbmwBMHircinesRingControlQuest.Transform to 1
	printc "equipped hircine's ring"
	StartQuest fbmwBMHircinesRingControlQuest
End
